Description.Text: Located in the centre of Sopot, barely 300 m away from the popular Monte Cassino Street, the Hotel Europa offers bright rooms, classically decorated and equipped with a work desk and free WIFI. The Europa is a great option for both business and leisure guests. The railway station and the pier are just a quick walk from the hotel.Guests can relax at the hotel's sauna or the Turkish steam room after spending the day visiting the city. They can also go hiking on the beautiful routes on the surrounding area. The hotel provides multifunctional conference rooms for organising business meetings, training sessions and seminars.A breakfast buffet is served every morning at the hotel's Parasolnik restaurant, where guests will also be able to order Ã la carte European cuisine. Guests can also find numerous restaurants, bars and cafÃ©s on the hotel surroundings.
